EmailTemplate.description: New Email Template setup in June 2012
EmailTemplate.name: TechnoKidz kicking off this Thursday (with correction)
EmailTemplate.subject: TechnoKidz kicking off this Thursday (with correction)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
A quick reminder that TechnoKidz after school activity will start this Thursday 1st November. If you are still interested in your child/ren participating in this new and exciting activity, please click here to sign up. Quick, you've only got until tomorrow afternoon! Please note that the pick-up time is 16:30 NOT 17:00.
Best regards,
The International School of Moscow World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Member of The British School Group- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Affiliate Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Russian Ministry of Education
